# Benchmark

## Adding or updating a module

Each module is included in the benchmark repository as a [git submodule](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Git-Tools-Submodules). This submodule is fixed at a particular commit (for example: [](https://github.com/komparo/tde/tree/master/modules/datasets/komparo)).



## Cookbook

### Rename submodule

To move to different directory
```bash
git mv [from] [to]
```

To change remote:

Edit remote in `.gitmodules`

```bash
git submodule sync
```
